title: My client crashes and it forces me to dodge and i get an LP loss?
body: Please find some way to help me  :C

replies.body:
Hey there,

* When does your client crash?
  * When loading into a game?
  * During champ select?
* Can you provide more details about the crash? Do you receive an error message?

Have you attempted [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)? Has this helped at all?

Ahh the same thing happens to me, made me dodge 2 Ranked games today because of it... It happens during champ select and the league window would just freeze, no error message appears either. (At least for me)

Would just freeze?

Did the client window enter a "Not responding" state?

Have you attempted a client repair as listed in my above post?

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) KB for me, let me know if anything helps.
